scripts.clean: rimraf build generated unmemoized js_output abc lib app/user/build app/user/libs
scripts.run: npm run build && mkdir -p ../../build/userPandaFiles && cp ./build/user.abc ../../build/userPandaFiles/hello.abc && npm run build:loader:node -C ../.. && ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=../../build PANDA_HOME=../../../incremental/tools/panda/node_modules/@panda/sdk node ../../build/index.js panda-ani:class=@ohos.example.src.ets.entry.Entry 10
scripts.pack: npm run clt:download && cd app && DEVECO_SDK_HOME=../$npm_package_config_sdk_path ../$npm_package_config_hvigorw_path --no-daemon --mode module -p product=default -p module=user@default assembleHar
scripts.har-arm32: npm run build && npm run copy && node $npm_package_config_sdk_cli_path download && node scripts/build-har.mjs --name user --arch arm32 && npm run pack
scripts.har-arm64: npm run build && npm run copy && node $npm_package_config_sdk_cli_path download && node scripts/build-har.mjs --name user --arch arm64 && npm run pack
scripts.har-universal: npm run build && node $npm_package_config_sdk_cli_path download && node scripts/build-har-universal.mjs --name user && npm run pack
